description: Type SM hose menders repair hose up to and including ID's of 12". After cutting out the damaged hose portion, insert each end of the mender (shanks) into the remaining good ends of the hose. Secure the SM type mender with bands or DB double bolt clamps. All sizes have NPS threads and complete valves are painted red.

description: Reusable, these clamps provide an efficient means of securing couplings for low pressure discharge or suction service. Double bolt hose clamps are sized for hose OD's from 1-5/8" through 17-1/2". As the bolts are tightened, the double-tongue saddles fill the gap between the bolt lugs preventing pinching of the hose OD. Fully tightened, the double bolt clamps secure the full circumference of the hose. Plated malleable iron.
specifications: Hose Outside Diameter:8-15/16 to 9-7/8 in|Torque:125 lbs/ft|Plated Material:Malleable Iron |Number of Bolts:2

Fully tightened, the double bolt clamps secure the full circumference of the hose. Plated malleable iron.
specifications: Hose Outside Diameter:6-1/8 to 6-7/8 in|Torque:60 lbs/ft|Plated Material:Malleable Iron |Number of Bolts:2

description: These clamps are used on any fitting with a collar to engage the forward gripping fingers of the interlocking clamp. However, they are most commonly used on ground joint females and male collared nipples. Smaller sizes provide a safe and economical securing method for universal hose ends. The forward gripping fingers engage the collar preventing the shank or stem from pulling out. Tightening the bolts secures the clamp around the O.D. of the hose.

description:
A unique design that relies on two bands of rubber that act as a type of gasket surrounding the two specific grooves on both shanks. These bands act as a preventive barrier, reducing the chance for leaks around the coupling.

Threaded couplings for suction or discharge of water or other fluids. Standard Threading is NPSM (National Pipe Straight Mechanical).
specifications: Size:3 in|Thread Type:NPSM (National Pipe Straight Mechanical) |Material:Aluminum with Brass Swivel |Used for:Suction, Discharge of water or other fluids.

description: Hose Ends are sleeve type couplings that fit over the OD of the sandblast hose. They are secured to the hose with wood screws. Countersunk holes on the hose end ensure that the screws fit correctly and will not be snagged while the hose is in operation. Within the ID of the hose end is a corkscrew ridge that helps to twist the coupling onto the hose and more importantly, helps to minimize the force of blow-back. Hose-to-hose or hose-to-pot connections are made by the 2 lug crowfoot design. No matter what the hose size, the 2 log hose ends interchange for common connections.
specifications: Hose Inside Diameter:1-1/4 in|Hose Outside Diameter:2-5/32 in|Type:Hose End |Material:Quick End Brass

description: Hose Ends are sleeve type couplings that fit over the OD of the sandblast hose. They are secured to the hose with wood screws. Countersunk holes on the hose end ensure that the screws fit correctly and will not be snagged while the hose is in operation. Within the ID of the hose end is a corkscrew ridge that helps to twist the coupling onto the hose and more importantly, helps to minimize the force of blow-back. Hose-to-hose or hose-to-pot connections are made by the 2 lug crowfoot design. No matter what the hose size, the 2 log hose ends interchange for common connections.

Classical belts are built to RMA engineering standard IP 20 and are dual branded with classical multiple size and FHP size. FHP designation denotes outside length. Classical designation denotes inside length. No need to stock both types when you use Jason UniMatch Dual Branded sizes.

Inside length plus 2 inches equals outside length.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:1/2 in|Thickness:11/32 in|Inside Length:221 in|Approx. Weight:1.40 lb

description:
Oil, heat and abrasion-resistant.

Stock timing belts are listed below. They have fiberglass tension members, neoprene body with nylon covered teeth, all bonded together for maximum strength.

For non-stock widths, Jason cuts specified widths from our large supply of timing belt sleeves on special order.

Mini-pitch MXL (0.080-inch pitch) timing belts are also available.

Jason timing belts are specified by belt length in inches times 10, belt pitch code and a three-digit belt width code which is the decimal inch-width multiplied by 100.

Any width available from stock, consult Jason for pricing.
specifications: Belt Length:90.0 in|Pitch Code:XXH |Width:5.00 in|No. of Teeth:72 |Approx. Weight:13.14 lb|Construction:

For non-stock widths, Jason cuts specified widths from our large supply of timing belt sleeves on special order.

Mini-pitch MXL (0.080-inch pitch) timing belts are also available.

Jason timing belts are specified by belt length in inches times 10, belt pitch code and a three-digit belt width code which is the decimal inch-width multiplied by 100.

Any width available from stock, consult Jason for pricing.

description:
Tough aramid reinforcement.

These belts are ideal for lawn and garden applications. Excellent shock resistance. Special cover for belt release and engagement in clutching applications. Special oil and heat resistant synthetic rubber. Part number denotes width and outside length; i.e., MXV4-300 is 1/2" wide and 30.0" outside.

These belts are ideal for lawn and garden applications. Excellent shock resistance. Special cover for belt release and engagement in clutching applications. Special oil and heat resistant synthetic rubber. Part number denotes width and outside length; i.e., MXV4-300 is 1/2" wide and 30.0" outside.

These belts are ideal for lawn and garden applications. Excellent shock resistance. Special cover for belt release and engagement in clutching applications. Special oil and heat resistant synthetic rubber. Part number denotes width and outside length; i.e., MXV4-300 is 1/2" wide and 30.0" outside.
specifications: Top Width:21/32 in|Thickness:3/8 in|Angle:40 º

These belts are ideal for lawn and garden applications. Excellent shock resistance. Special cover for belt release and engagement in clutching applications. Special oil and heat resistant synthetic rubber. Part number denotes width and outside length; i.e., MXV4-300 is 1/2" wide and 30.0" outside.
specifications: Top Width:3/8 in|Thickness:7/32 in|Angle:40 º|Approx. Weight:0.12 lb

description:
Oil and heat-resistant. Static dissipating.

A raw edge, cogged construction further increases the effective power transmission of deep wedge V-belts. These cogged deep wedge UniMatch V-belts need no belt set matching.

Stock raw edge, cogged deep wedge V-belts are listed below.

Cogged deep wedge V-belts are specified by the section number-letter with an "X" to indicated cogged construction. The number following is the belt’s outside length in inches multiplied by 10.
For example : 5VX900.
specifications: Top Width:5/8 in|Thickness:17/32 in|Approx. Weight:1.10 lb

A raw edge, cogged construction further increases the effective power transmission of deep wedge V-belts. These cogged deep wedge UniMatch V-belts need no belt set matching.

Stock raw edge, cogged deep wedge V-belts are listed below.

Cogged deep wedge V-belts are specified by the section number-letter with an "X" to indicated cogged construction. The number following is the belt’s outside length in inches multiplied by 10.
For example : 5VX900.
specifications: Top Width:5/8 in|Thickness:17/32 in|Approx. Weight:2.00 lb

Cogged deep wedge V-belts are specified by the section number-letter with an "X" to indicated cogged construction. The number following is the belt’s outside length in inches multiplied by 10.
For example : 5VX900.
specifications: Top Width:3/8 in|Thickness:7/8 in|Approx. Weight:0.5 lb

description:
Oil and heat resistant. Static dissipating.

RMA spec multiple V-belts in a raw edge, cogged construction are especially useful for high speed, compact drives. These belts all have the UniMatch feature.

Raw edge, cogged multiple V-belts are listed by industry number in which the first letter indicates belt section, the X is a cogged construction and the number is belt inside length in inches.

Inside length plus 4 inches equals outside length.
specifications: Top Width:7/8 in|Thickness:17/32 in|Inside Length:89 in|Approx. Weight:1.81 lb

Raw edge, cogged multiple V-belts are listed by industry number in which the first letter indicates belt section, the X is a cogged construction and the number is belt inside length in inches.

Inside length plus 3 inches equals outside length.

RMA spec multiple V-belts in a raw edge, cogged construction are especially useful for high speed, compact drives. These belts all have the UniMatch feature.

Raw edge, cogged multiple V-belts are listed by industry number in which the first letter indicates belt section, the X is a cogged construction and the number is belt inside length in inches.

Inside length plus 2 inches equals outside length.
specifications: Top Width:1/2 in|Thickness:5/16 in|Inside Length:52 in|Approx. Weight:0.35 lb

description:
Oil, heat and abrasion-resistant.

Stock timing belts are listed below. They have fiberglass tension members, neoprene body with nylon covered teeth, all bonded together for maximum strength.

For non-stock widths, Jason cuts specified widths from our large supply of timing belt sleeves on special order.

Mini-pitch MXL (0.080-inch pitch) timing belts are also available.

Jason timing belts are specified by belt length in inches times 10, belt pitch code and a three-digit belt width code which is the decimal inch-width multiplied by 100.

Any width available from stock, consult Jason for pricing.
specifications: Belt Length:54.0 in|Pitch Code:L |Width:1.00 in|No. of Teeth:144 |Approx. Weight:0.26 lb

Oil, heat and abrasion-resistant.

Stock timing belts are listed below. They have fiberglass tension members, neoprene body with nylon covered teeth, all bonded together for maximum strength.

For non-stock widths, Jason cuts specified widths from our large supply of timing belt sleeves on special order.

Mini-pitch MXL (0.080-inch pitch) timing belts are also available.

Jason timing belts are specified by belt length in inches times 10, belt pitch code and a three-digit belt width code which is the decimal inch-width multiplied by 100.

Any width available from stock, consult Jason for pricing.

Oil, heat and abrasion-resistant.

Stock timing belts are listed below. They have fiberglass tension members, neoprene body with nylon covered teeth, all bonded together for maximum strength.

For non-stock widths, Jason cuts specified widths from our large supply of timing belt sleeves on special order.

Mini-pitch MXL (0.080-inch pitch) timing belts are also available.

Jason timing belts are specified by belt length in inches times 10, belt pitch code and a three-digit belt width code which is the decimal inch-width multiplied by 100.

Any width available from stock, consult Jason for pricing.

Stock timing belts are listed below. They have fiberglass tension members, neoprene body with nylon covered teeth, all bonded together for maximum strength.

For non-stock widths, Jason cuts specified widths from our large supply of timing belt sleeves on special order.

Mini-pitch MXL (0.080-inch pitch) timing belts are also available.

Jason timing belts are specified by belt length in inches times 10, belt pitch code and a three-digit belt width code which is the decimal inch-width multiplied by 100.

Any width available from stock, consult Jason for pricing.
specifications: Belt Length:40.0 in|Pitch Code:H |Width:0.75 in|No. of Teeth:80 |Approx. Weight:0.23 lb

Jason timing belts are specified by belt length in inches times 10, belt pitch code and a three-digit belt width code which is the decimal inch-width multiplied by 100.

Any width available from stock, consult Jason for pricing.

description:
Neoprene fiberglass reinforced

Double sided belts afford power transmission from either side of the belt and are often used in reversing and serpentine applications.

They are specified the same way as timing belts except with a "D" prefix. For example: D240H100. Special widths are cut to order from our sleeve stock for fast delivery.

Double sided timing belts are produced using the same materials as single sided belts, except that the backside is ground from a fiber reinforced special rubber compound. There is no nylon facing on the backside. Power take off on the backside is limited to 50% of the total catalog rating.

Total belt rating is the same as for single sided belts.

Teeth with nylon facing should always be against driver pulley.
specifications: Belt Length:90.0 in|Pitch Code:H |Width:2.00 in|No. of Teeth:180 |Approx. Weight:1.70 lb

They are specified the same way as timing belts except with a "D" prefix. For example: D240H100. Special widths are cut to order from our sleeve stock for fast delivery.

Double sided timing belts are produced using the same materials as single sided belts, except that the backside is ground from a fiber reinforced special rubber compound. There is no nylon facing on the backside. Power take off on the backside is limited to 50% of the total catalog rating.

Total belt rating is the same as for single sided belts.

Teeth with nylon facing should always be against driver pulley.
specifications: Belt Length:70.0 in|Pitch Code:H |Width:1.50 in|No. of Teeth:140 |Approx. Weight:0.98 lb

Double sided belts afford power transmission from either side of the belt and are often used in reversing and serpentine applications.

They are specified the same way as timing belts except with a "D" prefix. For example: D240H100. Special widths are cut to order from our sleeve stock for fast delivery.

Double sided timing belts are produced using the same materials as single sided belts, except that the backside is ground from a fiber reinforced special rubber compound. There is no nylon facing on the backside. Power take off on the backside is limited to 50% of the total catalog rating.

Total belt rating is the same as for single sided belts.

Teeth with nylon facing should always be against driver pulley.
specifications: Belt Length:54.0 in|Pitch Code:H |Width:3.00 in|No. of Teeth:108 |Approx. Weight:1.52 lb

Double sided belts afford power transmission from either side of the belt and are often used in reversing and serpentine applications.

They are specified the same way as timing belts except with a "D" prefix. For example: D240H100. Special widths are cut to order from our sleeve stock for fast delivery.

Double sided timing belts are produced using the same materials as single sided belts, except that the backside is ground from a fiber reinforced special rubber compound. There is no nylon facing on the backside. Power take off on the backside is limited to 50% of the total catalog rating.

Total belt rating is the same as for single sided belts.

Teeth with nylon facing should always be against driver pulley.
specifications: Belt Length:39.0 in|Pitch Code:L |Width:0.50 in|No. of Teeth:104 |Approx. Weight:0.09 lb

Double sided belts afford power transmission from either side of the belt and are often used in reversing and serpentine applications.

They are specified the same way as timing belts except with a "D" prefix. For example: D240H100. Special widths are cut to order from our sleeve stock for fast delivery.

Double sided timing belts are produced using the same materials as single sided belts, except that the backside is ground from a fiber reinforced special rubber compound. There is no nylon facing on the backside. Power take off on the backside is limited to 50% of the total catalog rating.

Total belt rating is the same as for single sided belts.

Teeth with nylon facing should always be against driver pulley.
specifications: Belt Length:32.0 in|Pitch Code:L |Width:0.75 in|No. of Teeth:85 |Approx. Weight:0.11 lb

Double sided belts afford power transmission from either side of the belt and are often used in reversing and serpentine applications.

They are specified the same way as timing belts except with a "D" prefix. For example: D240H100. Special widths are cut to order from our sleeve stock for fast delivery.

Double sided timing belts are produced using the same materials as single sided belts, except that the backside is ground from a fiber reinforced special rubber compound. There is no nylon facing on the backside. Power take off on the backside is limited to 50% of the total catalog rating.

Total belt rating is the same as for single sided belts.

Teeth with nylon facing should always be against driver pulley.
specifications: Belt Length:24.0 in|Pitch Code:H |Width:3.00 in|No. of Teeth:48 |Approx. Weight:0.68 lb

Double sided belts afford power transmission from either side of the belt and are often used in reversing and serpentine applications.

They are specified the same way as timing belts except with a "D" prefix. For example: D240H100. Special widths are cut to order from our sleeve stock for fast delivery.

Double sided timing belts are produced using the same materials as single sided belts, except that the backside is ground from a fiber reinforced special rubber compound. There is no nylon facing on the backside. Power take off on the backside is limited to 50% of the total catalog rating.

Total belt rating is the same as for single sided belts.

Teeth with nylon facing should always be against driver pulley.
specifications: Belt Length:16.5 in|Pitch Code:L |Width:0.75 in|No. of Teeth:44 |Approx. Weight:0.06 lb

Double sided belts afford power transmission from either side of the belt and are often used in reversing and serpentine applications.

They are specified the same way as timing belts except with a "D" prefix. For example: D240H100. Special widths are cut to order from our sleeve stock for fast delivery.

Double sided timing belts are produced using the same materials as single sided belts, except that the backside is ground from a fiber reinforced special rubber compound. There is no nylon facing on the backside. Power take off on the backside is limited to 50% of the total catalog rating.

Total belt rating is the same as for single sided belts.

Teeth with nylon facing should always be against driver pulley.
specifications: Belt Length:100.0 in|Pitch Code:H |Width:1.50 in|No. of Teeth:200 |Approx. Weight:1.41 lb

description:
Accu-Link. Detachable tab type link belting. Make endless with a simple twist, no tools required.

Polyester fabric is impregnated with a premium polyurethane compound.

Jason's exclusive manufacturing process makes Accu-Link the most precise belt of its type, for optimum sidewall fit with the pulley.

Accu-Link is available in 25 ft & 100 ft cartons.

3L and A-Link also available in 5 ft sleeved length. B-Link also available in 6 ft sleeved length.
specifications: Length:25 ft|Weight per foot:0.17 lb

description:
Oil and heat-resistant. Static dissipating.

Especially designed for serpentine and reversing drives, double V-belts transmit power from both sides of the belt. Polyester cords and cotton/polyester cover provide maximum strength and length stability with minimum stretch. These belts conform to RMA Engineering Standard IP-21.

Double V-belts are available in three standard RMA sections AA, BB and CC and in lengths to 540 inches. They are specified by belt section letters, inside length in inches.

Dry can belts available on request.
specifications: Width:7/8 in|Thickness:11/16 in|Approx. Weight:2.2 lb

Especially designed for serpentine and reversing drives, double V-belts transmit power from both sides of the belt. Polyester cords and cotton/polyester cover provide maximum strength and length stability with minimum stretch. These belts conform to RMA Engineering Standard IP-21.

Double V-belts are available in three standard RMA sections AA, BB and CC and in lengths to 540 inches. They are specified by belt section letters, inside length in inches.
specifications: Width:21/32 in|Thickness:17/32 in|Approx. Weight:1.00 lb

description:
Neoprene fiberglass reinforced

Double sided belts afford power transmission from either side of the belt and are often used in reversing and serpentine applications.

They are specified the same way as timing belts except with a "D" prefix. For example: D240H100. Special widths are cut to order from our sleeve stock for fast delivery.

Double sided timing belts are produced using the same materials as single sided belts, except that the backside is ground from a fiber reinforced special rubber compound. There is no nylon facing on the backside. Power take off on the backside is limited to 50% of the total catalog rating.

Total belt rating is the same as for single sided belts.

Teeth with nylon facing should always be against driver pulley.
specifications: Belt Length:110.0 in|Pitch Code:H |Width:1.50 in|No. of Teeth:220 |Approx. Weight:1.54 lb

description:
Oil and heat-resistant. Static dissipating.

Especially designed for serpentine and reversing drives, double V-belts transmit power from both sides of the belt. Polyester cords and cotton/polyester cover provide maximum strength and length stability with minimum stretch. These belts conform to RMA Engineering Standard IP-21.

Double V-belts are available in three standard RMA sections AA, BB and CC and in lengths to 540 inches. They are specified by belt section letters, inside length in inches.
specifications: Width:21/32 in|Thickness:17/32 in|Approx. Weight:1.30 lb

description:
Oil and heat-resistant. Static dissipating.

Built to European standards DIN 7753, AFNOR T47-117, BS 3790 and ISO 4184. SP series V-belts were the forerunners of the RMA deep wedge, high capacity V-belt sections. These deep-wedge belts (38°) allow for more power, high speed ratios, smaller center distances and more compact drives. They are replacement belts for many imported machines and for machinery built for export.

These V-belts also have the UniMatch feature. This eliminates belt set matching with its multiple stocking problems.
Non-standard lengths are available on special order.
Metric V-belts are specified by letters showing the SP section and numbers giving the pitch length in millimeters.
For example: SPA 850.

NOTE : Belt sizes to 2240 mm in length are also available in raw edge construction. These belts are designated by an X prefix rather than S. For example: XPB1400. For Raw Edge Construction, add 25% to list price.

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 13 mm to pitch length for outside length.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:9.7 mm|Thickness:8 mm|Inside Length:962 mm|Approx. Weight:0.2 lb

For example: SPA 850.

NOTE : Belt sizes to 2240 mm in length are also available in raw edge construction. These belts are designated by an X prefix rather than S. For example: XPB1400. For Raw Edge Construction, add 25% to list price.

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 13 mm to pitch length for outside length.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:9.7 mm|Thickness:8 mm|Inside Length:937 mm|Approx. Weight:0.2 lb

description:
Oil and heat-resistant. Static dissipating.

Built to European standards DIN 7753, AFNOR T47-117, BS 3790 and ISO 4184. SP series V-belts were the forerunners of the RMA deep wedge, high capacity V-belt sections. These deep-wedge belts (38°) allow for more power, high speed ratios, smaller center distances and more compact drives. They are replacement belts for many imported machines and for machinery built for export.

These V-belts also have the UniMatch feature. This eliminates belt set matching with its multiple stocking problems.
Non-standard lengths are available on special order.
Metric V-belts are specified by letters showing the SP section and numbers giving the pitch length in millimeters.
For example: SPA 850.

NOTE : Belt sizes to 2240 mm in length are also available in raw edge construction. These belts are designated by an X prefix rather than S. For example: XPB1400. For Raw Edge Construction, add 25% to list price.

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 13 mm to pitch length for outside length.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:9.7 mm|Thickness:8 mm|Inside Length:687 mm|Approx. Weight:0.1 lb

These V-belts also have the UniMatch feature. This eliminates belt set matching with its multiple stocking problems.
Non-standard lengths are available on special order.
Metric V-belts are specified by letters showing the SP section and numbers giving the pitch length in millimeters.
For example: SPA 850.

NOTE : Belt sizes to 2240 mm in length are also available in raw edge construction. These belts are designated by an X prefix rather than S. For example: XPB1400. For Raw Edge Construction, add 25% to list price.

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 13 mm to pitch length for outside length.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:9.7 mm|Thickness:8 mm|Inside Length:2287 mm|Approx. Weight:0.5 lb

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 13 mm to pitch length for outside length.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:9.7 mm|Thickness:8 mm|Inside Length:1560 mm|Approx. Weight:0.3 lb

Oil and heat-resistant. Static dissipating.

Built to European standards DIN 7753, AFNOR T47-117, BS 3790 and ISO 4184. SP series V-belts were the forerunners of the RMA deep wedge, high capacity V-belt sections. These deep-wedge belts (38°) allow for more power, high speed ratios, smaller center distances and more compact drives. They are replacement belts for many imported machines and for machinery built for export.

These V-belts also have the UniMatch feature. This eliminates belt set matching with its multiple stocking problems.
Non-standard lengths are available on special order.
Metric V-belts are specified by letters showing the SP section and numbers giving the pitch length in millimeters.
For example: SPA 850.

NOTE : Belt sizes to 2240 mm in length are also available in raw edge construction. These belts are designated by an X prefix rather than S. For example: XPB1400. For Raw Edge Construction, add 25% to list price.

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 13 mm to pitch length for outside length.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:9.7 mm|Thickness:8 mm|Inside Length:1320 mm|Approx. Weight:0.3 lb

Metric V-belts are specified by letters showing the SP section and numbers giving the pitch length in millimeters.
For example: SPA 850.

NOTE : Belt sizes to 2240 mm in length are also available in raw edge construction. These belts are designated by an X prefix rather than S. For example: XPB1400. For Raw Edge Construction, add 25% to list price.

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 30 mm to pitch length for outside length. Additional sizes available to SPC13700.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:22 mm|Thickness:18 mm|Inside Length:8500 mm|Approx. Weight:6.7 lb

Metric V-belts are specified by letters showing the SP section and numbers giving the pitch length in millimeters.
For example: SPA 850.

NOTE : Belt sizes to 2240 mm in length are also available in raw edge construction. These belts are designated by an X prefix rather than S. For example: XPB1400. For Raw Edge Construction, add 25% to list price.

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 30 mm to pitch length for outside length. Additional sizes available to SPC13700.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:22 mm|Thickness:18 mm|Inside Length:2650 mm|Approx. Weight:2.1 lb

These V-belts also have the UniMatch feature. This eliminates belt set matching with its multiple stocking problems.
Non-standard lengths are available on special order.
Metric V-belts are specified by letters showing the SP section and numbers giving the pitch length in millimeters.
For example: SPA 850.

NOTE : Belt sizes to 2240 mm in length are also available in raw edge construction. These belts are designated by an X prefix rather than S. For example: XPB1400. For Raw Edge Construction, add 25% to list price.

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 22 mm to pitch length for outside length. Additional sizes available to SPB13700.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:16.3 mm|Thickness:13 mm|Inside Length:5990 mm|Approx. Weight:2.9 lb

Built to European standards DIN 7753, AFNOR T47-117, BS 3790 and ISO 4184. SP series V-belts were the forerunners of the RMA deep wedge, high capacity V-belt sections. These deep-wedge belts (38°) allow for more power, high speed ratios, smaller center distances and more compact drives. They are replacement belts for many imported machines and for machinery built for export.

These V-belts also have the UniMatch feature. This eliminates belt set matching with its multiple stocking problems.
Non-standard lengths are available on special order.
Metric V-belts are specified by letters showing the SP section and numbers giving the pitch length in millimeters.
For example: SPA 850.

NOTE : Belt sizes to 2240 mm in length are also available in raw edge construction. These belts are designated by an X prefix rather than S. For example: XPB1400. For Raw Edge Construction, add 25% to list price.

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 22 mm to pitch length for outside length. Additional sizes available to SPB13700.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:16.3 mm|Thickness:13 mm|Inside Length:3250 mm|Approx. Weight:1.6 lb

description:
Oil and heat-resistant. Static dissipating.

Built to European standards DIN 7753, AFNOR T47-117, BS 3790 and ISO 4184. SP series V-belts were the forerunners of the RMA deep wedge, high capacity V-belt sections. These deep-wedge belts (38°) allow for more power, high speed ratios, smaller center distances and more compact drives. They are replacement belts for many imported machines and for machinery built for export.

These V-belts also have the UniMatch feature. This eliminates belt set matching with its multiple stocking problems.
Non-standard lengths are available on special order.
Metric V-belts are specified by letters showing the SP section and numbers giving the pitch length in millimeters.
For example: SPA 850.

NOTE : Belt sizes to 2240 mm in length are also available in raw edge construction. These belts are designated by an X prefix rather than S. For example: XPB1400. For Raw Edge Construction, add 25% to list price.

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 22 mm to pitch length for outside length. Additional sizes available to SPB13700.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:16.3 mm|Thickness:13 mm|Inside Length:2120 mm|Approx. Weight:1.1 lb

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 22 mm to pitch length for outside length. Additional sizes available to SPB13700.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:16.3 mm|Thickness:13 mm|Inside Length:1400 mm|Approx. Weight:0.7 lb

NOTE : Belt sizes to 2240 mm in length are also available in raw edge construction. These belts are designated by an X prefix rather than S. For example: XPB1400. For Raw Edge Construction, add 25% to list price.

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 18 mm to pitch length for outside length. Additional sizes available to SPAS080.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:12.7 mm|Thickness:10 mm|Inside Length:4865 mm|Approx. Weight:1.4 lb

Metric V-belts are specified by letters showing the SP section and numbers giving the pitch length in millimeters.
For example: SPA 850.

NOTE : Belt sizes to 2240 mm in length are also available in raw edge construction. These belts are designated by an X prefix rather than S. For example: XPB1400. For Raw Edge Construction, add 25% to list price.

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 18 mm to pitch length for outside length. Additional sizes available to SPAS080.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:12.7 mm|Thickness:10 mm|Inside Length:2360 mm|Approx. Weight:0.7 lb

These V-belts also have the UniMatch feature. This eliminates belt set matching with its multiple stocking problems.
Non-standard lengths are available on special order.
Metric V-belts are specified by letters showing the SP section and numbers giving the pitch length in millimeters.
For example: SPA 850.

NOTE : Belt sizes to 2240 mm in length are also available in raw edge construction. These belts are designated by an X prefix rather than S. For example: XPB1400. For Raw Edge Construction, add 25% to list price.

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 18 mm to pitch length for outside length. Additional sizes available to SPAS080.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:12.7 mm|Thickness:10 mm|Inside Length:1882 mm|Approx. Weight:0.5 lb

These deep-wedge belts (38°) allow for more power, high speed ratios, smaller center distances and more compact drives. They are replacement belts for many imported machines and for machinery built for export.

These V-belts also have the UniMatch feature. This eliminates belt set matching with its multiple stocking problems.
Non-standard lengths are available on special order.
Metric V-belts are specified by letters showing the SP section and numbers giving the pitch length in millimeters.
For example: SPA 850.

NOTE : Belt sizes to 2240 mm in length are also available in raw edge construction. These belts are designated by an X prefix rather than S. For example: XPB1400. For Raw Edge Construction, add 25% to list price.

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 18 mm to pitch length for outside length. Additional sizes available to SPAS080.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:12.7 mm|Thickness:10 mm|Inside Length:1507 mm|Approx. Weight:0.4 lb

Oil and heat-resistant. Static dissipating.

Built to European standards DIN 7753, AFNOR T47-117, BS 3790 and ISO 4184. SP series V-belts were the forerunners of the RMA deep wedge, high capacity V-belt sections. These deep-wedge belts (38°) allow for more power, high speed ratios, smaller center distances and more compact drives. They are replacement belts for many imported machines and for machinery built for export.

These V-belts also have the UniMatch feature. This eliminates belt set matching with its multiple stocking problems.
Non-standard lengths are available on special order.
Metric V-belts are specified by letters showing the SP section and numbers giving the pitch length in millimeters.
For example: SPA 850.

NOTE : Belt sizes to 2240 mm in length are also available in raw edge construction. These belts are designated by an X prefix rather than S. For example: XPB1400. For Raw Edge Construction, add 25% to list price.

Although metric V-belts are ordered by section and pitch length, they are sometimes labeled with the section letters, belt length in millimeters and the letters LA (approx. length), LI (inside length) or LW (pitch length).

Add 18 mm to pitch length for outside length. Additional sizes available to SPAS080.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:12.7 mm|Thickness:10 mm|Inside Length:1220 mm|Approx. Weight:0.4 lb

description:
Oil and heat-resistant. Static dissipating.

UniMatch banded V-belts are available in classical multiple sections B, C and D and in deep wedge sections 3V, 5V and 8V. They feature the same premium constructions as the individual belt and are bonded together with a fabric-neoprene top band. These belts are often used on vertical shafts and where belt vibration and flopping must be minimized.

Stock banded V-belts are listed below. To obtain the total list price, multiply the list price per rib by the total number of ribs per band. In-between lengths of the B, C and D sections are available, as are lengths to 600 inches in the B and C sections on special order. Consult Jason Customer Service. These belts conform to RMA Engineering Standard IP-20 and IP-22.

Banded multiple V-belts are specified by the letter "R" denoting banded construction, the belt section and the belt Standard Length Designation in inches. The number of belts in a band is given separately; i.e., RC90 1X8 - 1 Belt & 8 Ribs.

Banded deep wedge V-belts are specified by the letter "R" denoting banded construction, the belt section and a number giving the outside length in inches multiplied by 10, followed by a dash and the number of bands required. R5V750 1X8 - 1 Belt & 8 Ribs.
specifications: Approx. Weight Per Rib:22.5 lb

In-between lengths of the B, C and D sections are available, as are lengths to 600 inches in the B and C sections on special order. Consult Jason Customer Service. These belts conform to RMA Engineering Standard IP-20 and IP-22.

Banded multiple V-belts are specified by the letter "R" denoting banded construction, the belt section and the belt Standard Length Designation in inches. The number of belts in a band is given separately; i.e., RC90 1X8 - 1 Belt & 8 Ribs.

Banded deep wedge V-belts are specified by the letter "R" denoting banded construction, the belt section and a number giving the outside length in inches multiplied by 10, followed by a dash and the number of bands required. R5V750 1X8 - 1 Belt & 8 Ribs.
specifications: Approx. Weight Per Rib:1.90 lb

specifications: Approx. Weight Per Rib:1.0 lb

description:
Oil and heat-resistant. Static Dissipating.

A more narrow, deeper wedge shape with more efficient load carrying characteristics and higher power capability allows for smaller, more compact drives. These belts feature the UniMatch construction. This eliminates belt set matching with its multiple stocking and belt wastage problems.

These belts conform to RMA Engineering Standard IP-22.

Stock UniMatch deep wedge V-belts are listed below. In-between lengths and lengths over 600 inches are available on special order.

Deep wedge V-belts are identified by a number and letter specifying the belt section and a number giving the outside length in inches multiplied by 10.
For example : 3V1250.
specifications: Top Width:1 in|Thickness:7/8 in|Approx. Weight:16.40 lb

Oil and heat-resistant. Static Dissipating.

A more narrow, deeper wedge shape with more efficient load carrying characteristics and higher power capability allows for smaller, more compact drives. These belts feature the UniMatch construction. This eliminates belt set matching with its multiple stocking and belt wastage problems.

These belts conform to RMA Engineering Standard IP-22.

Stock UniMatch deep wedge V-belts are listed below. In-between lengths and lengths over 600 inches are available on special order.

Deep wedge V-belts are identified by a number and letter specifying the belt section and a number giving the outside length in inches multiplied by 10.
For example : 3V1250.
specifications: Top Width:1 in|Thickness:7/8 in|Approx. Weight:7.50 lb

Stock UniMatch deep wedge V-belts are listed below. In-between lengths and lengths over 600 inches are available on special order.

Deep wedge V-belts are identified by a number and letter specifying the belt section and a number giving the outside length in inches multiplied by 10.
For example : 3V1250.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:5/8 in|Thickness:17/32 in|Approx. Weight:2.20 lb

Oil and heat-resistant. Static Dissipating.

A more narrow, deeper wedge shape with more efficient load carrying characteristics and higher power capability allows for smaller, more compact drives. These belts feature the UniMatch construction. This eliminates belt set matching with its multiple stocking and belt wastage problems.

These belts conform to RMA Engineering Standard IP-22.

Stock UniMatch deep wedge V-belts are listed below. In-between lengths and lengths over 600 inches are available on special order.

Deep wedge V-belts are identified by a number and letter specifying the belt section and a number giving the outside length in inches multiplied by 10.
For example : 3V1250.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.

Classical belts are built to RMA engineering standard IP 20 and are dual branded with classical multiple size and FHP size. FHP designation denotes outside length. Classical designation denotes inside length. No need to stock both types when you use Jason UniMatch Dual Branded sizes.

Inside length plus 2 inches equals outside length.

For notched construction add 25% to the list price.
specifications: Top Width:1/2 in|Thickness:11/32 in|Inside Length:99 in|Approx. Weight:0.50 lb
